Package socialmedia

Class Post

  • java.lang.Object
    • socialmedia.Post
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Comment, Endorsement

    public class Post
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Post class represents a post within the SocialMedia structure. Created for ECM1410 CA3. Two subclasses, Endorsement and Comment
    Version:
    13/04/2021
    Author:
    700040999, 700005222
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
